channel.title: Explantion on how to possibly fix the problem please
channel.description:
Ok, well my trading is very badly bugged. When I trade someone and accept it works fine the players get the items etc. But when I decline the players get froze where they are and do not get their items back. Can ANYONE please explain to me how to possibly fix this?
[b]Base:[/b] Devolution

item.title: Explantion on how to possibly fix the problem please
item.dc:creator: @Skype1 Skype™
item.description:
@Skype1 wrote:

Any items… the client does not freeze the players freeze as in they cannot walk no more and the traded items when you decline are not gave back.

Read full topic
item.source: Explantion on how to possibly fix the problem please

item.title: Explantion on how to possibly fix the problem please

item.description:
